Excellent: 🎉 Great job! Keep your consistency and challenge yourself with advanced topics. Try participating in quizzes and competitions.
Good: 👍 You're doing well! Focus on tricky areas and revise daily. Practice previous year papers and aim to reach the next level.
Average: 📚 You're on the right track. Revise your basics and solve 2-3 practice problems every day. Create a study timetable.
Needs Improvement: 🚀 Don’t worry! Start with foundational concepts. Study regularly, ask doubts, and use videos or tutorials to understand better.
